text: Skazhi, o prorok, lyudyam: "Merzkoye, zapreshchonnoye Allakhom, i khorosheye, odobrennoye Allakhom, ne odinakovy. Raznitsa mezhdu nimi bol'shaya u Allakha, khotya izobiliye merzkogo poroy privodit v voskhishcheniye mnogikh lyudey". O razumnyye lyudi! Boytes' Allakha i povinuytes' Yemu! Eto zashchitit vas ot Yego nakazaniya. Vybirayte dobroye i otklonyaytes' ot durnogo, chtoby vy byli schastlivy i poznali blazhenstvo v blizhayshey zhizni i v posleduyushchey
